title: Africa: How African Economies Can Cope With China Slowdown
description: [allAfrica] Cape Town -- The International Monetary Fund (IMF) has urged sub-Saharan African nations to take steps to offset the recent slowdown of growth in China.

title: Africa: Transcript - African Finance Minister's Press Conference
Africa: WHO Director-General's Remarks At the Opening Ceremony of the World Health Summit, Berlin, Germany - 15 October 2023
Africa: Seize Opportunity to End Last Major Mercury Device
description: [IPS] Washington DC -- As the Minamata Convention on Mercury's fifth Conference of the Parties (COP5) approaches, momentum builds to adopt the Africa Region's proposed amendment to phase out dental amalgam - a cavity filling material that is approximately 50% mercury.

title: Africa: There Are No Longer Small Teams in Africa - Belmadi
description: [CAF] Head coach of the Algerian national team, Djamel Belmadi says the upcoming TotalEnergies CAF Africa Cup of Nations, Cote d'Ivoire 2023 will be very difficult.

title: Africa: Cutting Disaster Risk Will Boost Equality, Improve Resilience
description: [UN News] Marking the International Day for Disaster Risk Reduction on Friday, UN chief António Guterres called on countries everywhere to boost resilience and adaptation, to build a safer and more just future for all.

title: Africa: Behind Each Climate Disaster Awaits a Tuberculosis Crisis
description: [IPS] New York -- At the end of September, two weeks after the United Nations held a High-Level Meeting on Tuberculosis (TB), a torrential storm dropped 6" of rain on New York City. The intensity of the storm recalled that of Hurricane Ida two years earlier, which--in the largest city in the United States--damaged more than 3% of buildings, killed 13 people, and left 380 families homeless.

title: Africa: The Digital Space Is the New Frontier for Gender-Based Violence
description: [UNFPA] Today (International Day of the Girl Child, 11 October 2023: Digital Generation. Our Generation.), 77 million adolescent girls in East and Southern Africa encapsulate boundless potential for leadership and change. The future lies in their hands.

title: Africa: Middle East and North Africa Should Lead Way to De-Escalate Israel-Hamas War
description: [Chatham House] Regional players have spent the last five years finding pragmatic solutions to end conflict and forge connections. Now they must address the issue they have sought to avoid.
